readingMnemonic: Standing in <kanji>sunshine</kanji> for this long has worked up your appetite, so you take a <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう) cup out of your bag and eat it.
meaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> has <radical>easy</radical> access to <kanji>sunshine</kanji>. It's big and tall, so the <kanji>sunlight</kanji> shines right onto its roof.
